title: Front Fork - Inspection

body.body: Thoroughly clean and examine all components for damage, wear, scoring, corrosion etc., paying particular attention to the bushes and damper rod piston ring. Renew as necessary.
Always renew the oil seal, dust seal and the damper rod bolt sealing washer every time the fork is dismantled.
